titleStmt.title: Of the immortality of mans soul, and the nature of it and other spirits. Two discourses, one in a letter to an unknown doubter, the other in a reply to Dr. Henry Moore's Animadversions on a private letter to him, which he published in his second edition of Mr. Joseph Glanvil's Sadducismus triumphatus, or, History of apparitions by Richard Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
With: Baxter, R. Of the nature of spirits. London, B. Simmons, 1682.
